DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of MK0928 for insomnia (a sleep disorder).
DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Study of MK0928 in Adult Outpatients With Insomnia (0928-014)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Adult outpatients who are between the ages of 18 and 64 Adults who do not have a diagnosis of insomnia (a sleep disorder)
